nodes.text: Tell me about magic combat please.
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text: How do I make runes?
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text:
Can you toggle my runes to equip when I pick them
up please?
nodes.title: <player>

nodes.text:
Hello there adventurer, I am the Magic combat tutor.
Would you like to learn about magic combat, or perhaps
how to make runes?
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
Or you can let them go into your inventory like
normal.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

text.ENG: Tell me about magic combat please.
Can you toggle my runes to equip when I pick them up please?

nodes.text: TOGGLE(AUTO_RUNE_EQUIP,TRUE)
nodes.title: EXECUTE

nodes.text: TOGGLE(AUTO_RUNE_EQUIP,FALSE)
nodes.title: EXECUTE

nodes.text:
There you go! Your runes will now go to your
inventory when you pick them up.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
There you go! Your runes will now automatically be
added to your rune pouch when you pick them up.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
Certainly. If you own a rune pouch and pick up runes
that you have stored in it, I can make those runes be
automatically added to your rune pouch, providing you
have space for them all!
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
To get rune essence you will need to gather them
somehow. You should talk to the Duke of Lumbridge, he
may be able to help you with that. Alternatively, other
players may sell you the essence.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
As you're fairly new to runecrafting you should start
with air runes and mind runes.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
You will need a talisman for the rune you would like to
create. You can right-click on it and select the Locate
option. This will tell you the rough location of the altar.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
When you find the ruined altar, use the talisman on it
to be transported to a temple where you can craft your
runes.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
Clicking on the temple's altar will imbue your rune
essence with the altar's magical property.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
If you want to save yourself an inventory space, you
could always try binding the talisman to a tiara.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
To make one, take a tiara and talisman to the ruins
and use the tiara on the temple altar. This will bind the
talisman to your tiara.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
There are a couple of things you will need to make
runes, rune essence and a talisman to enter the temple
ruins.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
This is your spell book, this contains all the spells you
can cast. To cast a spell, you will need to have the
required magic level and have the right amount of the
runes used to cast the spell.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
If you have the right amount of runes and the magic
level the spell will light up, meaning you will be able to
cast it.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
When you have a combat spell available, click on it once,
then select your target. A good target would be a
monster that is below your combat level.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
Try rats in the castle or, if you're feeling brave, the
goblins to the west have been causing a nuisance of
themselves.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
Nemarti, the Ranged Combat tutor and I both give out
items every 30 minutes, however you must choose
whether you want runes or ranged equipment.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
Nemarti, the Ranged Combat tutor and I both give out
items every 30 minutes, however you must choose
whether you want runes or ranged equipment.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text:
To claim runes, right-click on me and choose Claim, to
claim ranged equipment right-click on the Ranged
Combat tutor and select Claim.
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor

nodes.text: Is there anything else I can help you with?
nodes.title: Magic combat tutor
